agendaCount(address).notice: Returns number of agendas for a vault

createAgenda(address,string,string,strin.notice: Create a new agenda for a vault (appends new version)

latestAgendaId(address).notice: Get latest agenda id for a vault, returns (exists, id)

setAgendaActive(address,uint256,bool).notice: Toggle active state of an agenda version (for deprecating/archiving)

updateAgendaMetaTags(address,uint256,str.notice: Update metaTags for an agenda version (allowed to provide additional labels)
